ONE SUNDAY , MARCH 6TH Standings : 4th place in the Metropolitan Division 19 Regular Season Games Remaining [Patrick O’Doul]609-o’doul knelt on [his]609-o’doul yoga mat , eyes closed . “ Let [your]609-o’doul breath find its natural rhythm , ”[609-o’doul] came a soothing voice at the front of [the room]318-the room . “ Become aware of its temperature , and of the sensation of [your]609-o’doul breath as [you]609-o’doul exhale . ”[609-o’doul] [He]609-o’doul exhaled slowly , obeying [Ariana]783-ariana , [the team]319-the team ’s massage therapist and yoga instructor . [O’Doul]609-o’doul did n’t give a crap about yoga . [He]609-o’doul did n’t know where [his]609-o’doul chakras were , and [he]609-o’doul did n’t remember any of the names of the poses . But on game day [he]609-o’doul never objected to this mandatory hour of [Simon]74-simon Says with the beauty at the front of [the room]318-the room . [She]783-ariana had [them]320-them holding [child]321-child ’s pose for a couple of minutes . Since [he]609-o’doul stunk at yoga , [he]609-o’doul needed to listen closely to [her]783-ariana instructions . The concentration yoga required was the best part — if [the pretty lady in the pink sports bra]322-the pretty lady in the pink sports bra was trying to twist [your]323-your body into a New Age pretzel , there was no time to worry about the opponent [you]323-your had to face down in five hours . “ As [you]323-your hold the pose , reconnect [your]323-your breathing with [your]323-your body . Notice how the breath moves through the ribcage in this pose , ”[783-ariana] [she]783-ariana suggested . “ Use each exhale to settle a little more firmly into the stretch . [We]1977-we ’re opening up the hips . . . ”[783-ariana] [Ariana]783-ariana circled among [[her]783-ariana students]324-her students , making a posture correction here and there . [She]783-ariana stopped at [O’Doul]609-o’doul ’s side , then got down on all fours . “ Hi , ”[783-ariana] [she]783-ariana whispered . When [he]609-o’doul turned [his]609-o’doul head , [he]609-o’doul met a pair of brown eyes , sparkling with mischief . “ [Hi]75-hi ? ”[783-ariana] [She]783-ariana rarely began conversations during class . “ If this is too hard on [your]323-your hip flexors , go back into tabletop . ”[783-ariana] “ [I]609-o’doul ’m good , ”[609-o’doul] [he]609-o’doul grunted . Christ . [The whole world]325-the whole world was focused on [his]609-o’doul weakness . Chronic muscle soreness should n’t be such a big deal . So take it easy . Let gravity do the work , okay ? And do [me]783-ariana a favor ? ”[783-ariana] “ What ? ”[609-o’doul] [He]609-o’doul ’d never had a conversation with [anyone]326-anyone when [they]326-anyone were both folded in two on the floor . “ Do n’t blow off [your]323-your next massage appointment . [You]330-your ’ll show up this time , right ? ”[783-ariana] “ Sure , ”[609-o’doul] [he]609-o’doul promised , because it was hard to think up a decent excuse when [you]330-your were sweating over [your]330-your yoga mat . [Ari]376-ari gave [him]609-o’doul one more killer smile and got up , moving on to correct [another player]331-another player ’s posture . [He]609-o’doul watched [her]783-ariana go , then felt guilty about missing [his]609-o’doul appointments and also for checking out [her]783-ariana perfect ass . If [they]339-they ended up in fourth place , [they]339-they might squeak into the last spot . It was possible . But , as [O’Doul]609-o’doul ’s team - issued phone told [him]609-o’doul every time [he]609-o’doul pulled it out of [his]609-o’doul pocket , [their]339-they play - offs spot was not a lock . [[Kattenberger]72-nate ’s sophisticated model]341-kattenberger ’s sophisticated model projected [their]339-they chances at 81 percent . There was no room for error . And tonight ’s game meant a lot because [Boston]1-boston was one of the other Eastern teams in contention for those last couple of slots . [They]339-they were so close . So fucking close [he]609-o’doul could taste it . “ Get some rest before the game , ”[72-nate] [Nate]72-nate suggested , squeezing [his]72-nate forearm . [O’Doul]609-o’doul fought the instinct to shake off [the big boss]342-the big boss ’s casual touch . “ Will do , ”[72-nate] [he]72-nate agreed , knowing it was a lie . [He]72-nate ’d go back to [the hotel]343-the hotel and lie down for a while . But sleep would elude [him]72-nate the same way it did on every game day . “ See [you]72-nate tonight , ”[72-nate] [he]72-nate said . [Nate]72-nate gave [him]72-nate one more nod and walked away . * * * Eight hours later , [the fans]344-the fans roared as [Boston]1-boston made another attempt on goal . [O’Doul]609-o’doul watched from the bench , feeling grim . The most grueling part of [his]609-o’doul job was n’t the hockey game , or the constant travel . And it was n’t the fighting , or the stitches and bruises . It was the dread . Sitting on the bench between shifts , it sunk low in [his]609-o’doul belly . It was heavy , like lead . And each time [he]609-o’doul vaulted over the wall it rose up in [his]609-o’doul throat like bile . If [[any team]345-any team ’s enforcer]346-any team ’s enforcer ever told [you]347-you [he]609-o’doul never felt dread , [that man]609-o’doul was lying . [No human]348-no human could put [his]609-o’doul body in the path of a six - three scrapper ’s fist three or four times a week without anticipating the pain . Tonight ’s fight had been pre - arranged in the worst possible way , too . [[The other team]319-the team ’s enforcer]350-the other team ’s enforcer — a dick by the name of [Trekowski]80-trekowski — had called [him]80-trekowski out last night on social media . On fucking Twitter . Maybe [O’Doul]609-o’doul wo n’t wimp out on fighting [me]327-pete tomorrow night . # [AGuyCanHope # BabySayYes]81-aguycanhope # babysayyes . Of all the dick moves [O’Doul]609-o’doul had witnessed , [this one]351-vince took the trophy . [He]609-o’doul had n’t responded , because [he]609-o’doul did n’t even have Twitter . [He]609-o’doul did n’t tweet . Or twat . Whatever . [The team]319-the team ’s publicist — [Georgia]1098-georgia — had responded on [his]609-o’doul behalf . [He]609-o’doul ’d approved a pithy little quote for [the Bruisers]82-the bruisers ’ Facebook page : [Someone]352-someone punched [me]327-pete on the interwebs ? [he]609-o’doul ’d supposedly replied . Funny , [I]327-pete did n’t feel a thing . [He]609-o’doul had to admit it was a clever response . A hockey fight was supposed to have purpose . Usually , a fight was payback for a cheap shot that endangered one of [[his]609-o’doul guys]353-his guys . Other times , the brawl was meant to fuel an ongoing rivalry , rallying [the team]319-the team and changing the energy of a game . Fights were n’t supposed to start because some bonehead wanted to flex [his]609-o’doul shiny personality on social media . And [they]319-the team sure as hell were n’t supposed to be fueled by a lie . [O’Doul]609-o’doul had never ducked a fight in [his]609-o’doul life . But [he]609-o’doul ’d missed the last game against [Boston]1-boston on account of a procedure on a tendon in [his]609-o’doul wrist . Thankfully , and with the help of the best medical attention money could buy , [his]609-o’doul wrist had healed up fast . But lately [he]609-o’doul had a new problem — pain in [his]609-o’doul hip flexor muscles . It was a low - grade thing . Something to watch . But it made [him]609-o’doul feel a lot less invincible than [he]609-o’doul was used to . At thirty - two years old [he]609-o’doul was suddenly more conscious of the toll the game took on [his]609-o’doul body . And the fighting [he]609-o’doul did for [[his]609-o’doul team]319-the team made everything riskier . So much could go wrong in those violent sixty or ninety seconds . Still , the hours leading up to the fight hurt worse than a cross to the jaw . As tonight ’s game wore on , the dread got heavier . [He]609-o’doul ’d already spent the first two periods trying to make plays while simultaneously taking it easy on [his]609-o’doul hip . While trying not to appear to take it easy on [his]609-o’doul hip . And keeping the warlike mask on [his]609-o’doul goddamn face . Frankly , it was exhausting . Earlier this season [he]609-o’doul ’d had an unusually frank heart - to - heart with [another team ’s enforcer]354-another team ’s enforcer — [an old timer known as [the Hammer]83-hammer]354-another team ’s enforcer . [He]609-o’doul was [the nicest guy in [the world]355-the world]609-o’doul — [the kind who wanted to buy [you]356-you a drink after [you]356-you ’d finished beating the crap out of each other]609-o’doul . Maybe it was the scotch , but that night [he]609-o’doul ’d confessed how much mental energy the fights demanded of [him]609-o’doul . “ [Doulie]72-nate , ”[83-hammer] [The Hammer]83-hammer said , using [his]83-hammer nickname . “ Try some chemical courage . [I]83-hammer can share it with [you]356-you now that [we]1980-we ’re not gon na match up again this season . ”[83-hammer] [He]609-o’doul ’d pulled out a pill bottle and shaken eight of the tablets into O’Doul ’s palm . “ Take one of those before a game . ”[83-hammer] “ What is it ? ”[609-o’doul] “ Uppers . ”[83-hammer] [Hammer]83-hammer closed [O’Doul]609-o’doul ’s hand over the pills . “ [You]356-you ’ll love [’em]1981-’em . Only one a game , though , okay ? And [you]356-you wo n’t get hooked . ”[83-hammer] [O’Doul]609-o’doul was n’t proud of it , but [he]609-o’doul ’d hidden those tablets in a bottle of plain aspirin . Parsing [them]357-they out over the next three weeks , [he]609-o’doul ’d taken one pill before each game . The results were even better than [Hammer]83-hammer promised . The drug made [him]609-o’doul feel energetic and invincible . But then [they]357-they were gone . TWENTY - SIX MONDAY , MARCH 28TH [Ari]376-ari slept uneasily in [Brooklyn]4-brooklyn that night . Instead , [she]376-ari kept [her]376-ari panic button close by , and spent half the night listening for trouble , before finally falling into a deep sleep around three thirty . [She]376-ari woke up with a start when [her]376-ari alarm went off , and felt immediately uneasy . Given all that had occurred in [her]376-ari life lately , that was n’t terribly unusual . But as [she]376-ari came to consciousness alone in [her]376-ari own bed , it was n’t [Vince]351-vince [she]376-ari was worried about . This morning [she]376-ari woke with an image of [Patrick]609-o’doul in [her]376-ari mind , and a tickle of worry at the base of [her]376-ari skull . Maybe it was just uncertainty about the gift [she]376-ari ’d bought [him]609-o’doul . Yesterday after [her]376-ari massage appointments ended [she]376-ari walked [Atlantic Avenue]58-atlantic avenue until [she]376-ari found what [she]376-ari was looking for — a dual coffee and espresso machine , the same model as [her]376-ari own . But was that weird ? [Friends]2783-friends could buy [friends a coffeemaker]2855-friends a coffeemaker , right ? Usually [she]376-ari used this time to meditate on what [she]376-ari wanted to accomplish with [them]319-the team . But the prickle of unease would n’t leave [her]376-ari . [She]376-ari slung the shopping bag containing the coffeemaker over one shoulder and left [the house]551-the house . [Ari]376-ari loved teaching in [this bright , modern room]318-the room . It had high - tech sprung flooring and soft natural light . [She]376-ari hooked [her]376-ari iPod up to the sound system and straightened the stack of yoga blocks in the corner .
